subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Steroids
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: France’s antidoping agency received paperwork from the Tour de France runner-up Oscar Pereiro Friday explaining why he took an asthma drug during the race last summer.
snippet: France’s antidoping agency received paperwork from the Tour de France runner-up Oscar Pereiro Friday explaining why he took an asthma drug during the race last summer.
